titles.title: No Early Release for Fentanyl Traffickers Act
To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit awarding credit toward service of sentences for satisfactory behavior for certain drug offenses.
No Early Release for Fentanyl Traffickers Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
No Early Release for Fentanyl Traffickers Act
The bill prohibits good time credit for a federal prisoner who is serving a prison term for manufacturing, distributing, or possessing with intent to distribute fentanyl.
